meanings.definition: To bear witness or testify together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: We will be coattesting in court tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The two friends coattested to the events of that evening.
meanings.sent3: Coattesting with my sister made the experience less intimidating.
meanings.sent4: Their coattesting created a united front against the accusations.
meanings.sent5: The act of coattesting strengthened their bond as siblings.

meanings.definition: To affirm or confirm something alongside another person.
meanings.sent1: I will be coattesting the accuracy of the report with my colleague.
meanings.sent2: The team coattested the findings of the study during the presentation.
meanings.sent3: Coattesting with my friend felt like a team effort.
meanings.sent4: Their coattesting added credibility to the project proposal.
meanings.sent5: Coattesting ensures mutual agreement on important matters.
